snippet: Aby Rosen, the real estate titan and art collector, has upset his neighbors in Old Westbury, N.Y., with a 33-foot-tall statue of a naked woman ripped open to reveal a fetus.
abstract: Residents of Old Westbury, NY, plan to protest 33-foot, painted bronze sculpture of naked pregnant woman with exposed fetus by Damien Hirst that real estate titan and art collector Aby Rosen plans to place on his front lawn; village officials, as result of complaints and outcry, have voted to hold public hearing on proposed law to limit height of statues to 25 feet.
lead_paragraph: Aby Rosen, the real estate titan and art collector, has upset his neighbors in Old Westbury, N.Y., with a 33-foot-tall statue of a naked woman ripped open to reveal a fetus.

headline.seo: The Art Collector Aby Rosen’s Latest Face-Off
